alert.note: Alert for Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 05 at 8:16AM EST until January 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...River Valleys within Southern Herkimer, Southern Fulton, Montgomery, Northern Saratoga, Schoharie, Western Schenectady, Eastern Schenectady, Southern Saratoga, Western Albany and Southeast Warren Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Interstate 87, the Adirondack Northway between exits 10 and 17, and Interstate 90, the New York State Thruway between exits 25 and 30, will be most impacted by the areas of dense fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady
